fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Political Pressure (Day, 2): Force target player A to vote for target player B. Then, prevent target A from any further voting for the day.
> - Cannot force the King to vote, but can force votes against the King.
- Intrigue (Night): Frame a player and receive feedback of abilities used on them. Will not receive feedback for conversions, attacks, King abilities, or self-targeting abilities.
- Court Spy (Night, 2 Uses): Summon shadows to report the contents of all whispers tomorrow.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Royal Blood: During elections for a new King, votes for you count twice.
> - Passive kept on class change.
